TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerContact extends System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerContact Inherits Peer Implements IEquatable(Of PeerContact), ISerializable

summary.span: 代表使用者已擷取其擴充資訊的對等電腦。

span.span: Represents a peer for which a user has retrieved extended information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連絡人代表受信任的對等。A contact represents a trusted peer. A必須建立遠端對等的物件或使用者 「 近端分享 」 範圍內時，與遠端對等共同作業。A object must be created for a remote peer or for a user to collaborate with the remote peer when it is outside of the "People Near Me" scope. A物件可以存在於遠端電腦或使用者的遠端電腦上執行的其中一個應用程式。A object can exist as either an application running on a remote computer, or the user of a remote computer. 這個類別的執行個體可以加入至以持續方式儲存的連絡資訊。An instance of this class can be added to the which stores the contact information in a persistent manner. 從應用程式邀請是驗證和加密。An application invitation from a is both authenticated and encrypted. 若要接受或拒絕對等之連絡人的邀請的 UI 對話方塊也會指出邀請者被信任。The UI dialog to accept or reject an invitation from a peer contact also indicates that that the inviter is trusted. 訂閱物件表示遠端對等可以看到已註冊的應用程式、 物件和顯示狀態資訊。Subscribing to a object means a remote peer can see its registered applications, objects and presence information. 若要訂閱，呼叫端必須登入，才能透過對等共同作業基礎結構或透過 Windows UI 登入。To subscribe to a , the caller must be signed in to the peer collaboration infrastructure via or signed in via the Windows UI. 所有其他作業並不需要登入。All other operations do not require sign-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示名稱可能會用來區分中的連絡人執行個體中其中可能會有多個電子郵件地址，或者如果有多個對等使用相同的顯示名稱。A display name may be used to differentiate contacts in a in instances where a may have multiple email addresses, or if there are multiple peers with the same display name.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當共同作業的工作階段的分葉，某些物件已不再需要。When a leaves a collaboration session, certain objects are no longer required. 如果此連絡人具有共同作業不會直接向對等主控件的任何其他端點與主應用程式預期會繼續與它們的共同作業，主機必須註冊這些端點在應用程式或其之前處置這個物件。If this contact had been collaborating with any other endpoint(s) not directly registered with the peer host, and the host expects to continue to collaborate with them, the host must register those endpoints within an application or within its before disposing of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件用來代表郵件地址。A object is used to represent the mail address. 請連絡管理員可讓一個執行個體中的多個電子郵件地址。The Contact Manager allows for multiple email addresses within one instance. 這個屬性的預設值為 `null`。The default value for this property is `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫的對等沒有訂閱指定相關聯必須在呼叫這個方法之前呼叫方法。If the calling peer is not subscribed to the associated with the specified the method must be called prior to calling this method. 當呼叫端不需要登入共同作業基礎結構，此方法才能成功完成，在成功呼叫或其中一個方法必須已完成，而呼叫端先前已登入。While the caller is not required to sign-in to the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully, a successful call to or one of the methods must have been completed while the caller was previously signed in. 這項功能只會公開在類別。This functionality is only exposed on the class. 這項功能不會顯示在任何其他類型的對等，基於安全性考量。This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons.

- 呼叫端對等個體尚未呼叫 方法。The calling peer has not yet called the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫的對等沒有訂閱指定相關聯必須在呼叫這個方法之前呼叫方法。If the calling peer is not subscribed to the associated with the specified the method must be called prior to calling this method. 當呼叫端不需要登入共同作業基礎結構，此方法才能成功完成，在成功呼叫或其中一個方法必須已完成，而呼叫端先前已登入。While the caller is not required to sign-in to the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully, a successful call to or one of the methods must have been completed while the caller was previously signed in.

span.span: cannot be .

Docs.exception:
- 呼叫端對等個體未訂閱 。The calling peer is not subscribed to the .
- 呼叫端對等個體尚未呼叫 方法。The calling peer has not yet called the method.

summary.span: 傳送邀請，以加入寄件者所贊助的對等共同作業活動。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫端不需要登入基礎結構，此方法才能成功完成。The caller is not required to sign-in to the infrastructure for this method to complete successfully. A從受邀者不接受邀請共同作業受邀者相同。A from the invitee is not the same as the invitee accepting the invitation to collaborate. 如果某個邀請傳送給遠端對等電腦尚未安裝應用程式時，就會自動拒絕邀請。If an invitation is sent to a remote peer that has not installed the application, the invitation is automatically declined.

A從受邀者不接受邀請共同作業受邀者相同。A from the invitee is not the same as the invitee accepting the invitation to collaborate. 如果某個邀請傳送給遠端對等電腦尚未安裝應用程式時，就會自動拒絕邀請。If an invitation is sent to a remote peer that has not installed the application, the invitation is automatically declined.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSubscribed As Boolean
public: property bool IsSubscribed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定目前的 是否已訂閱或取消訂閱端點。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the current is subscribed or unsubscribed to an endpoint.

summary.span: 或者，這個屬性會取得或設定值，這個值會指定目前的對等主應用程式或裝載應用程式是否已訂閱或已取消訂閱這個 。

span.span: Alternatively, this property gets or sets a value specifying whether the current peer host or hosting application has subscribed or unsubscribed to this .

value.span: 如果這個 已訂閱這個端點，則為 ，如果連絡人未訂閱或已取消訂閱，則為 。

span.span: if this is subscribed to this endpoint, if the contact has not subscribed or has unsubscribed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在許多情況下，等的主應用程式相同。In many instances, a is not the same as a peer host. 對等主機有執行個體內遠端對等，而且它們已經邀請的對等共同作業的關聯性。A peer host has an instance within the of the remote peer, and the relationship is that they have invited the peer to collaborate. 端點內含"Me"內自己連絡人的管理員和對等主控件執行個體，但是未指定的關聯性。An endpoint has a "Me" instance within its own contact manager and the peer host, but the relationship is not specified. 如果對等主機，且無法供選擇的對等個體連絡人、 其封鎖，而不是從主機連絡管理員刪除項目可以具有的值。If the peer host is in the , and the peer contact chooses not to , its can have a value of blocked, rather than deleting its entry from the host Contact Manager. 沒有本機對等電腦、 遠端對等體、 對等主機和訂用帳戶之間的多對多關聯性。There is a many-to-many relationship between local peers, remote peers, peer hosts, and subscriptions. 訂閱是每位使用者，而不是程序、 應用程式，或網域。Subscriptions are per user, rather than per process, per application, or per domain. 因此，訂用帳戶相關聯物件已經訂閱的連絡人清單，並且它預期會從其中更新。Consequently, the subscriptions associated with a object are the list of contacts to which it has subscribed and from which it expects updates. 這些連絡人可能是已更新自己的應用程式、 物件和顯示狀態資訊，或它們更新中的連絡人資訊。Those contacts either have updated their own application, object, and presence information, or they have updated information regarding contacts in the . 這個屬性永遠傳回`true`的物件是否代表本機或"Me"連絡人、 因為一律訂閱連絡人至本身。This property always returns `true` if the object is a which represents the local or "Me" contact, since a contact is always subscribed to itself.

span.span: This object has been disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用於暱稱以防有相同的顯示名稱的多個對等的物件。A Nickname can be used for a object in case there are multiple peers with the same display name. 共同作業工作階段也可以使用別名來指定遠端對等體常用於較大的共同作業工作。A collaboration session can also use the nickname to designate remote peers commonly used in larger collaboration efforts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnApplicationChanged(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs appChangedArgs) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnApplicationChanged (appChangedArgs As ApplicationChangedEventArgs)

param.name: appChangedArgs
param.span: 要傳遞給與 事件關聯之委派的 物件。

span.span: The object to be passed to delegates associated with the event.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟動、 註冊或取消登錄與共同作業基礎架構應用程式時，會發生應用程式變更。Application changes occur when an application is launched, registered or unregistered from the collaboration infrastructure. 對等會加入或離開共同作業工作階段或變更網路端點位置時，它們也會發生。They also occur when peers join or leave a collaboration session or change network endpoint locations. 對等範圍變更也可能會影響應用程式中的變更。Peer scope changes may also effect a change in an application. 繼承自這個類別的類別可以覆寫這個方法，以在事件發生時執行額外的工作。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.

para.span: 在衍生類別中，務必呼叫這個方法的基底類別實作，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: In a derived class, be sure to call the base class implementation of this method so that registered delegates receive the event.
